title: LoL the past month has been the worst for me in 3 years.
body:
All i want to say is... WHEN WILL I EVER GET INTO A GAME WHERE THERE IS NO NIDALEE, HECARIM, LISSANDRA, VI AND RIVEN
It's all i've been seeing this past month and it's making league of legends so boring and literally losing all interest. No matter how good I or my team do
if they have any of those champions above and they get a decent start or make it to late games it gg.

replies.body: Well, i kinda agree, the meta is pretty %%%% right now, all you see is the same broken champs over and over again, for me as a top lane main the champs that i always see is Riven, Sion and Irelia, i see these three probably 90% of the time and its really annoying especially when these champs aren't exactly balanced, looking at you Riven and Irelia, don't have a problem with Sion though, not yet at least.

> Well, i kinda agree, the meta is pretty %%%% right now, all you see is the same broken champs over and over again, for me as a top lane main the champs that i always see is Riven, Sion and Irelia, i see these three probably 90% of the time and its really annoying especially when these champs aren't exactly balanced, looking at you Riven and Irelia, don't have a problem with Sion though, not yet at least.

leblanc zed kat here as a mid main

or if you ban all 3 you suffer elsewhere

we need like 7 bans a side

At least with Zed he actually requires skill, can't just go in and expect to kill whoever the %%%% you want, you get %%%%ed over if you don't do it properly, i respect Zed as a champion, but Leblanc and Kat are just dumb, Kat requires no brains to play and while Leblanc does require some skill her mobility and burst is just dumb.

We need more bans, the game is in a broken state at the moment to be honest, mid and top are full of broken champs, jungle though they aren't really broken the main problem there is diversity, support is actually fine though and ADC is a little stale, i'd say 4 bans on every team is a good idea, we need to be able to get rid of broken/overpowered champs until Riot fixes them.
then if they are so common for you, pick counters
